title: Out of Time
lyrics:
Back-stab me one more time 
I swear it'll be the last time
This is your last goodbye
No getting away with this lie
The demon takes his throne
He waits until your all alone

No thought no regret

My anger's real it's not a threat



You knocked me down and now you're head is mine

Yes i'm the one you fear you can't deny

There's nowhere left for you to run and hide

You're running out of time



Thrown down on the floor

Yes i'm the one who wants it more

Beat you bleed you dry

Don't you run don't even try

Spit out on your face

I hope you taste your blood, disgrace 

Blood stains my hand tonight

You'll never win this fight



You knocked me down and now you're head is mine

Yes i'm the one you fear you can't deny

There's nowhere left for you to run and hide

You're running out of time
